name: Enterprise MCP Profile

warning: This profile consumes 71% of context at startup. Enable Tool Search: ENABLE_TOOL_SEARCH=true

figma.description: Figma design file access and component inspection

notion.description: Notion workspace access for docs and knowledge bases

linear.description: Linear issue tracking and project management

memory.description: Persistent knowledge graph for cross-session context retention

docker.description: Docker container and image management operations

sentry.description: Sentry error tracking and performance monitoring

datadog.description: Datadog observability, metrics, and log analysis
